name: Standard Birthday Bliss
description1: Celebrate your special day with our Standard Birthday Bliss package.
description2: Transform your party space with a delightful mix of balloons, banners, and streamers. This package includes everything you need for a classic and joyous birthday celebration.

name: Basic Celebration Delight
description1: Make your birthday memorable with our Basic Celebration Delight package.
description2: This budget-friendly package includes colorful balloons and a personalized banner, creating a cheerful atmosphere for your celebration. Simple yet delightful, it's perfect for intimate gatherings.

name: Premium Party Extravaganza
description1: Go all out with our Premium Party Extravaganza package!
description2: Turn your birthday into an extravagant event with this premium package. Featuring an assortment of premium balloons, elegant decorations, and a customized backdrop, this package is designed for those who want to make a statement on their special day.

name: Economy Birthday Bash
description1: Enjoy a festive atmosphere on a budget with our Economy Birthday Bash package.
description2: Perfect for smaller gatherings, this package includes essential decorations like balloons and streamers to add a touch of celebration to your birthday without breaking the bank.

name: Luxury Jubilee Celebration
description1: Indulge in luxury with our Luxury Jubilee Celebration package.
description2: Elevate your birthday experience with this opulent package, featuring high-quality decorations, premium table settings, and a personalized ambiance. Create lasting memories in style with this luxurious celebration package.

name: Sweet and Simple Soiree
description1: Keep it sweet and simple with our Sweet and Simple Soiree package.
description2: Ideal for those who appreciate the beauty of simplicity, this package includes charming decorations that add a touch of sweetness to your birthday celebration. Enjoy the simplicity of a well-curated and delightful party setup.
